name: Crux - Epicure - Robusto Extra
additionalNotes: Crux Epicure cigars are for those who want to simply indulge in a relaxing smoke that will light up their palate with beautifully rich yet smooth flavors from start to finish. Usually a bolder brand, Crux made the Epicure in order to appeal to the high end mild bodied cigar smokers out there, and boy did they hit the mark. Cream, nougat, and a rich smoothness all pour from this incredibly crafted cigar courtesy of a star-studded blend of premium longfillers, all wrapped in a silky Connecticut Shade wrapper.Â
